useCase.name: Collaborative Repository Creation
useCase.description: Allows a teacher and student to collaborate on repositories.

preconditions.precondition: Teacher and student have GitHub accounts.

successEndConditions.condition: Teacher and student are collaborators on the StudentRepo repository.

mainSequence.step: Teacher applies for a GitHub account.
Student applies for a GitHub account.
Teacher creates a public repository TeacherRepo.
Student creates a private repository StudentRepo.
Student sends an email requesting to be a collaborator on StudentRepo to the teacher.
Teacher approves the request and becomes a collaborator on StudentRepo (in bulk).
